internal.content: Treehouse is a free .psd template with a nice modern look. project was created with the help of Gulp - task runner and vanilla JavaScript. Website contains only one page, just like in .pds file.

Lotto is a simulator of a popular lottery at the same name in Poland. In this project I've mainly focused on JavaScript code, I haven't paid too much attention to design. Choose your 6 lucky numbers(1 to 49) and see how many you hit. Numbers are drawn randomly without repeat.

HotNews app was written with, vanilla JavaScript and Webpack. In this project, I used JS Modules which, allowed me to split my code into parts and make him less vague :). Project design was also designed by me.

Weather app which, was written using Vue. You can check the weather in any city (if only is delivered by OpenWeatherMap API). It has been my first serious project with Vue, which helped me to increase my coding skills, and Vue understanding. The graphic design of the project was designed by me. I wish to thanks HelloRoman for a brilliant tutorial

SountIT is simple app piano simulator created with react. Currently, it's the very early alpha version - first working build. You can play easy melodies using your's mouse or keyboard where sound name is key on the keyboard - for example, sound 'A' is 'A' key on the keyboard, sound 'F' is 'F' key on keyboard etc. Currently is available only one octave.
